results.title: How to negotiate a great salary package
results.brief_description: What this video lacks in glamorous production values, it more than makes up for in practical tips to negotiate the salary package you want from your employer. The program is in two segments, the first presented by Judy Rose who is experienced in negotiation skills. The second segment is presented by Mike Taylor of Prime Time Financial Counsellors who gives sound financial advice on options within salary packages. Produced for the Australian Institute of Training and Development.

results.title: How to keep from catching VD
results.brief_description: A health officer addresses a class of secondary school students about gonorrhea and syphilis. Using charts, he explains the immediate and long-range effects of each disease. Stress is placed on the possible prevention of the diseases through selective sexual behaviour, cleanliness and the use of mechanical devices.
results.description: A health officer addresses a class of secondary school students about gonorrhea and syphilis. Using charts, he explains the immediate and long-range effects of each disease. Stress is placed on the possible prevention of the diseases through selective sexual behaviour, cleanliness and the use of mechanical devices.

results.title: How to conduct a work sampling study
results.brief_description: This film offers a convenient and practical “tool” for teaching supervisors and managers how to conduct their own studies. It demonstrates the role of work measurement in reducing costs and the step-by-step procedures in planning, preparing, performing and reporting.
